title: January transfers: Hit or miss? | Football News | Sky Sports
text:
January transfers: Hit or miss? Last Updated: 01/02/17 3:53pm Saido Berahino joined Stoke City from West Brom in January Will the big Premier League January signings be hits or misses? Here's your chance to have your say. 
We've picked out some of the biggest deals done in the winter window and want your verdict on whether they will be successful switches or not. 
So, swipe right if you're a fan of the player and reckon his new club have done well to bring him in - or swipe left if you don't. Also See:
